item.title: Membership system
item.dc:creator: @edred edred
item.description:
@edred wrote:

i am trying to make a system so if a player has 500mill in their inv they can type a command and get member so far i have this please could somebody tell me what i have to do next e.g. command i need to add.

public void mbuy()
{
    if (playerIsMember > 0)
    {
        sendMessage("You're already a member!");
        return;
    }
    if (!playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000))
    {
        sendMessage("You don't have enough money to purchase membership!");
        return;
    }
    deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 500000);
    playerIsMember++;
    sendMessage("You have just purchased membership!");
    sendMessage("You now have access to new member quests, skills, and items!");
}

Read full topic
